Reviews.Title: “A very good choice in an excellent location”

Reviews.Content: location excellent quiet central street paces champs elysees close famous shopping street arc de triomphe metro paying fortune hotel hard beat hotel cozy atmosphere friendly efficient staff decent sized price favourable 8th arondissement

Reviews.Title: “Best location great staff”
Reviews.Author: Dilo-Jake
Reviews.Content: visit hotel bit cramped am spoiled hotels sister la residence foch hotel half block champs corner metro george clean maintained little tired breakfast easily hotel

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful, Clean, Parisian”
Reviews.Author: MaireGirl
Reviews.Content: loved hotel location fantastic public transit minute walk tube shopping paris steps front desk pleasant helpful booking train tickets providing time schedules walker 5 minutes arc de triomphe effiel tower coffee tea provided bathroom amenities please am seasoned european traveler seasons exceeded expectations night

Reviews.Title: “Absolute Perfection”
Reviews.Author: zensurfergirl
Reviews.Content: fiance returned weekend paris visit pleased stay hotel galileo red eye chicago 7am paris time arrival hotel midmorning store luggage freshen restroom graciously receive checked 30 minutes beyond expectation realize depends somewhat availability speaks personalized service provided property quaint clean exactly overall hotel charm mattress firm stayed nights chance eat downstairs overall hotel kept managed woman front desk assisted map recommended wonderful sights staff encountered incredibly helpful location hotel incredible 15 blocks champs elysees blocks arc de triomphe dined shopped easily blocks walked monuments george metro stop extremely close hotel galileo weather fantastic opted walk doubt paris time highly recommend hotel feel deserves wonderful reviews received absolutely

Reviews.Title: “Large Room and good location”
Reviews.Author: lucafromferrara
Reviews.Content: stayed night hotel business trip confirm tripadvisor average score location steps champs upscale neighborhood price pretty decent considering paris location surprisingly parisian standards plenty towels quality bathroom stock bathroom amenities bed confortable heating ok hot cold quiet appreciated american style coffee maker coffee tea try breakfast expensive street cafè champs solid hotel pricequality ratio recommend

Reviews.Title: “Very impressed! Will be back again!”
Reviews.Author: Belle_Ame_4
Reviews.Content: stumbled hotel galileo trip advisor extremely happy stay time struggling injury location absolutely sensational sightseeing tour bus stop champs elysées street metro station close clean nice quiet slept morning sets hotel apart stayed trip staff extremely knowledgable able answer pretty question answer booked tickets helped knowing injury hotel galileo staff round staff experienced travels job look forward seeing 2012 2013 whenever trip australia

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in excellent location. Very helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: fr0764
Reviews.Content: hotel galileo hotel located close champs elysées pleased night stay pricequality ratio paris standards located street bothering noise clean nice bathroom

Reviews.Title: “great little hotel in an excellent location”
Reviews.Author: curransarah
Reviews.Content: daughter stayed 4 days august wonderful stay management friendly helpful spotless breakfast included rate perfect start days eggs fresh coffee course croissant bathroom nice size windows fresh air air conditioned weather hot enjoyed air hotel located 2 blocks champs street nice restaurants staff recommended stay recommended friends

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel in Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Andyt279
Reviews.Content: time visiting paris expect stay spent days looking trip advisor hotel close champselysses larc de triomphe proved fantastic location staff extremely friendly helpful giving advice eat hotel added charm adaquate clean amenities expect including free wifi hotel added fantastic stay paris definately stay recommend

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, clean, friendly staff and ideal location”
Reviews.Author: Michellere
Reviews.Content: mother stayed week loved breakfast convenient staff attentive free internet air conditioning safe mini bar contained essentials disappointment sizeit little meant super organized managed definitely return

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Galileo
